name: getMssqlDbMissedRecoverableRanges
description: Retrieve a list of missed recoverable ranges for a Microsoft SQL database. For each run of one type of error, the first and last occurrence of the error are given.

id.description: ID of the Microsoft SQL database.

after_time.description: Filter the missed ranges to end after this time. The date-time string should be in ISO8601 format, such as "2016-01-01T01:23:45.678".

before_time.description: Filter the missed ranges to start before this time. The date-time string should be in ISO8601 format, such as "2016-01-01T01:23:45.678".
